product_name: Novara Purist Hydroflo Self-Sealing Water Bottle - 23 fl. oz.
long_description: Novara Purist Hydroflo water bottle delivers pure-tasting water fast and easy thanks to a comfortably held, super-squeezable design and high-flow, self-sealing cap. 3-sided shape is optimized to fit in your hand for a comfortable, controlled grip that reduces the chance of dropping bottle. BPA- and phthalate-free polyethylene bottle is super-flexible for easy squeezing and fast water delivery; bottle can be frozen and/or have ice placed inside of it. Purist treatment infuses the bottle's interior with silicon dioxide to prevent odors, stains, and mold from attaching to the inner surface, offering a pure taste. Watergate cap features self-sealing Heart Valve(TM) nozzle allows water to flow when you want and seals tight when you don't; nozzle can be removed for cleaning. Secure lockout on nozzle ensures leak-free transport and shaking/mixing of powdered drink mixes. Please note: interior of the Novara Purist Hydroflo self-sealing water bottle should never be scrubbed or mechanically scratched. Recommended cleaning method is to rinse your bottle with warm water and a mild detergent; alternatively, bottle can be washed on the top rack of a dishwasher.
